comments.comment:
It is because in  PlanSubqueries, we have scalar-subquery in Expression. 

then in transformAllExpression method, since expression changed, in QueryPlan.mapExperssion() method we will make a copy of the tree. For aggregate expression, when makeCopy, it will got a new DeclarativeAggregate expression with lazy val inputAggBufferAttributes  will be null. When we reuse this value in  HashAggregateExec.doConsumeWithoutKeys,  inputAggBufferAttributes will be re-initial with a new exprId, then error happended.

 

In right SparkPlan,  inputAggBufferAttributes is same as child's output.
